author: sky.cactus
content: I think if you want to go less than that you'll need to just say "given a single 256-bit value, the magic cryptography allows us to create a proof that any specific piece of data exists in a set of data without needing to provide the entire set of data."

author: sky.cactus
content: Even that uses terminology like "set" that may be daunting depending on the audience.
